Package serverSide.main

Server generation. Static solution based on implicit monitors for synchronization. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ServerBar
    Service provider agent for access to the Bar.
    ServerGeneralRepos
    Server side of the General Repository of Information.
    ServerKitchen
    Service provider agent for access to the Kitchen.
    ServerTable
    Service provider agent for access to the Table.
    SimulPar
    Definition of the simulation parameters.
